articles.content:
Rwanda has pulled off a massive upset in the Womens Under-19 Cricket World Cup in South Africa, defeating the West Indies by four wickets in Potchefstroom on Sunday.

articles.description: Australia's left-arm pacer Joel Paris lost control in his bowling and Steve Smith made the most of it during the BBL match between Hobart Hurricanes and Sydney Sixers on Monday.
